title: How good is corki right now

replies.body: Hes so-so, if you know how to play him you can do a lot with him, if not lane might be tough

> [{quoted}](name=Got Lucians Wife,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=re1lZAzG,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-03T12:57:10.966+0000)
>
> Hes so-so, if you know how to play him you can do a lot with him, if not lane might be tough

Thank you I have played one game and did pretty well but the enemy katarina was pretty brain dead so just wanted to see if he is good or if it was just luck.
